web-app:
jOAI (v@VERSION@)
hideAdminMenus false
Set to 'true' to hide the administrative menus in the user interface.
pageBottomImport
A page to import and insert at the bottom of each HTML page in the interface. Used for inserting tracking code such as Google Analytics or other snippets at the bottom of each page.
Value should be an absolute URL, for example 'http://myhost.com/bottom_import.html'. Leave blank to disable.
dataProviderAccessLogLevel FinalResumption
Defines how to log client (harvester) requests to the data provider. Possible values are (no quotes): 'Full' - Logs all client interactions with the data provider 'FinalResumption' - Logs only client requests for the final segment of a ListRecords or ListIdentifiers request, indicating a complete harvest 'NoLog' - No log is written for client interactions with the data provider (default if not set)
updateFrequency 480
Time, in minutes, between checking for modified metadta files and making them available in the data provider index. Use 0 to disable automatic updates.
maxNumFilesToIndex 500
The maximum number of files to index per block. For Mac OSX, this may need to be set as low as 25 to prevent 'too many open files' errors. For Linux and Windows, this can be set to 500.
repositoryData WEB-INF/repository_settings_and_data
Location of the persistent, UI-editable application settings and indexes for the data provider.
repositoryConfigDir WEB-INF/conf
The directory where the RepositoryManager config files reside, such as the config for default search fields, field boosting level, synonyms and other application configuration properties
harvesterData WEB-INF/harvester_settings_and_data
Location of the persistent application settings and indexes for the harvester.
zippedHarvestsDirectory admin/zipped_harvests
Location where zippped harvests will be saved to, relative to the context root. An absolute path may also be specified, however zip files will not be available for download via the web-based UI.
harvestTimeOutMilliseconds 300000
Number of milliseconds the harvester waits for a response from a given data provider before timing out.
serverUrl [determine-from-client]
This parameter defines the scheme, hostname and port for the server, which is displayed in the base URL for the data provider and elsewhere, for example http://www.example.org or http://www.example.org:8080. If the value '[determine-from-client]' is supplied (default), then the scheme, hostname and port number will be determined by examining the URL that was requested by the client. Note that when using mod_proxy with Apache, Tomcat must be configured properly in order for this mechanism to work. Refer to the Tomcat proxy how to documentation at http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/proxy-howto.html for information about configuring Tomcat for use with mod_proxy.
dataProviderBaseUrlPathEnding provider
The last portion of the OAI data provider's Base URL, for example 'provider' or 'oai2-0'.
debug false
Indicates whether or not debugging messages will be output to standard out. Must be [true | false].
